text: aur un logon ne khuda kee jaisee qadr daanee karanee chaahie thee usakee ( kuchh bhee ) kadr na kee haalaanki ( vah aisa qaadir hai ki) qayaamat ke din saaree zameen (goya) usakee mutthee mein hogee aur saare aasamaan (goya) usake daahine haath mein lipate hue hain jise ye log usaka shareek banaate hain vah usase paakeeza aur baratar hai
